subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2357 has been delivered
description_text:
I received my order with no issues however the product broke on the first day and now it is not working. I created a ticket for this and have not received any responds, it has been 48 hours. The plastic from the throttle broke leaving the small spring loose inside. I am requesting a fix for this issue. 




Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone


On Monday, August 18, 2025, 11:08 AM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi jeffery Gallimore,  Hello, we can send you replacement upgraded parts, so please don’t worry. The current blue limiter, when adjusted to the extreme minimum travel, may cause damage to the anti-interference non-metallic spacer. The new parts we will send you have been improved, and this issue will no longer occur.
Hi jeffery Gallimore,    We have already sent you a replacement accelerator pedal. Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045866965961
Thank you for such quick response!
